abstract: Comcast removes NBC’s iconic peacock from the company’s logo as part of its takeover of NBC Universal.
snippet: Comcast removes NBC’s iconic peacock from the company’s logo as part of its takeover of NBC Universal.
lead_paragraph: On the eve of the Comcast-NBC Universal marriage, some people were perturbed by the party favors. Specifically, they were worried about what was missing — a peacock.

headline.main: Lost in the Comcast Takeover? A Logo’s Peacock
